extendedInfo.description: The classic card game Solitaire brought up-to-date with silky smooth high-res 3D graphics and fluid, addictive gameplay.â All-new HD Graphics optimized for Phones and Tablets ââ Achievements unlock new deck designs, deck backs, and tables ââ NEW high score tables âSolitaire Ultra features high-resolution 3D graphics combined with exciting gameplay to bring the world's favourite game into the 21st Century. Choose from many different designs for the cards, the backs, and the table, to crate your perfect playing environment.And now, with Global and National High Score Tables, compete against the world for the highest score!Solitaire Ultra is free, with ads. You can remove ads by purchasing the option within Solitaire Ultra.Solitaire, also known as Klondike or Patience, is the worldâs most popular solo card-game.

reviews.title: RECOMMENDED when ads r removed on paid app...
reviews.comment: If u check ur support, i sent you a copy of the google receipt stating that I DID pay for it. Not my problem if your database isnt accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solitaire Ultra
reviews.comment: Pretty screens, fun options to unlock for win rewards. Cool graphics like a movie trailer when u do win. Double tap a bit fussy sometimes, but overall really nice game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game even better if carried over scores
reviews.comment: This game is so addictive,  cool graphics,  just wish could carry over scores from one game to next. Have a Sony tablet s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Great visual.Plays very well. Would like to see the option of choosing your own background and card image from your gallery pictures.  This app still gets 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After trying about 12 different solitaire downloads, I finally found one with cool graphics, easy to read cards, and is still fun& challenging.  Thanks!\tSee description
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Solitaire
reviews.comment: Smooth animations, looks great, a pleasure to play. Best Solitaire I\'ve played on any platform. Thank you!
reviews.author: David Hill

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: I love playing the game but sometimes it takes points from me after the game is finish just for touching the screen and the timer doesn\'t stop. Please fix!!!
reviews.author: Brook Ali

reviews.title: Addictively fun enjoyable game
reviews.comment: Addictively fun enjoyable game :-)
reviews.author: paul neu

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: While I have only seen what the demo/trial version has to offer, it was enough to warrant a five star rating and a promise to purchase.  Highly recommended for anyone what is looking to play a classic game of solitaire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME KLONDIKE!  Rochelle
reviews.comment: The more u win the more backgrounds for cards/etc u win, makes the game funnier I guess :-)  Is an Awesome Klondike, I recommend it if u like klondike solitaire!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Erik
reviews.comment: I have only found 1 problem, the ace of dimonds won\'t move or some times a 10 will hide facing you behind another card not facing you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solitare Ultra
reviews.comment: Good game...like graphics, choices, love the music. Only wish as you win it would open up more challenging games or variations.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love the flow of the game.  The way it\'s set up,  someone with limited mobilty could enjoy playing this game.  My hat is off to you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Easy to play. Fun graphics and animation. Just need card to flip automatically after you play card on top.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Good game when it works. Looks great, but sometimes there are duplicate cards which makes it unable to complete even if you were going to win. Ex: I was about to win a game when I realized there were two seven of diamonds. Happens a LOT. Please fix it.
reviews.author: Buddy Shanelle Starnes

reviews.title: Solitaire Queen
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this game and specifically this exact one. It\'s the best of all the others.
reviews.author: Maria Harrell

reviews.title: Ultra solitiare
reviews.comment: Good game play and graphics. Keep up the good work!                                                           Thank you EPN
reviews.author: Eric Norberg

reviews.title: Great on Nook Tablet
reviews.comment: An EXCELLENT game of solitaire with lots of replay value to unlock content. I HIGHLY suggest this app. And even runs great on the Nook!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game got crash
reviews.comment: Galaxy tab 7.0 plus I try many time when i click button start and got DC
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sometimes hard to move cards.
reviews.comment: The graphics are great. The sound is too. Sometimes I try to tap and move a card and it doesn\'t move. I have to tap it again. Also, I wish it had automatic card moves like MS Sol.exe.
reviews.author: A Google User
